item.description:
The Summer days are winding down and we need to enjoy it while it lasts! Join us for a bike ride along the Minuteman Bikeway. This will be a casual to moderate bike ride. We will stop at the ice cream shop along the bike path and then grab a late lunch after we finish our bike ride. Those of you who want to rollerblade may join us also.

Things to bring - water bottle, snack, bike lock, helmet (optional).

*slight change in plans - we will all meetup at the Bike Stop and ride from there. see address below.


Bike rental rates are $6/hour or $35 for the day. I have reserved 4 bike rentals as needed so far. For any new rsvps - please indicate whether you need a rental or not.

Parking - free street parking on Dudley St.



Date: Saturday, 9/20/08

Time: 10:30 am

Address:
The Bike Stop
43 Dudley St.
Arlington, MA




For more information, please visit this site http://www.minutemanb...

Please note in your rsvp if you need to rent - and if you need a ride. We can arrange for picking up people at Alwife T stop @ 10 am.

Please email me if you have any questions.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Biking on the Minuteman Trail
